definition: A unit of measurement commonly used in the context of land area, equivalent to 10,000 square meters or 2.471 acres. It is frequently employed in agricultural, real estate, and urban planning contexts to quantify the size of plots, fields, or land parcels.

examples.english: One hectare is equal to 10,000 square meters

examples.german: Der Park erstreckt sich Ã¼ber mehrere Hektar
examples.english: The park extends over several hectares
